summary.span: 提供 接口的基实现并启用应用程序之间的对象共享。

span.span: Provides the base implementation for the interface and enables object sharing between applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是公共语言运行时中按引用封送的所有组件的基类。 is the base class for all components in the common language runtime that marshal by reference. 可远程处理，并且派生自 类。 is remotable and derives from the class. 提供接口的实现 。 provides an implementation of the interface. 提供 通过值封送的的实现。The provides an implementation of that marshals by value. 你可以 在实现接口的任何对象中承载 ，并且可以从其容器中查询和获取服务。You can host a in any object that implements the interface, and you can query and get services from its container. 容器 为它包含的每个创建一个 。The container creates an for each it contains. 容器使用站点来管理 ，并使用 来与其容器通信。The container uses the site to manage the and is used by the to communicate with its container. 应通过调用方法显式释放资源 ，而无需通过隐式调用方法来等待自动内存管理 。A should release resources explicitly by calls to its method, without waiting for automatic memory management through an implicit call to the method. 如果 释放，则中的所有组件 也会被释放。When a is disposed, all components within the are also disposed.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property CanRaiseEvents As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool CanRaiseEvents { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个指示组件是否可以引发事件的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the component can raise an event.

value.span: 如果组件可以引发事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the component can raise events; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认实现始终返回 `true` 。The default implementation of this property always returns `true`. 从类继承的类 应重写此属性，以提供禁止引发事件的功能。Classes that inherit from the class should override this property to provide the ability to disable the raising of events. 例如，在类中 ，如果控件作为 ActiveX 控件承载，则 `false` 当 activex 控件的事件冻结时，属性将返回。For example, in the class, if the control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, the property returns `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.

para.span: 如果在派生类中重写此方法，并将其更改为返回 ，则 由属性返回的集合将 为事件返回。

span.span: If you override this method in a deriving class and change it to return , the collection returned by the property returns for an event.

para.span: 仍可以在集合中添加和移除事件，但集合的 属性将始终返回 。

span.span: Events can still be added and removed from the collection, but the collection's property will always return .

span.span: The that contains the , if any, or if the is not encapsulated in an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 容器中的组件在先进先出列表中跟踪，此列表还定义了组件在容器中的顺序。The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container. 最后添加的组件是列表中的最后一个组件。The last component added is the last component in the list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设计模式指示符存储在中， 因此，如果没有 关联的，则此属性的值为 `false` 。The design mode indicator is stored in the ; therefore, if the does not have an associated with it, the value of this property is `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event Disposed As EventHandler

summary.span: 在通过调用 方法释放组件时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the component is disposed by a call to the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建 委托时，请标识将处理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about the event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在通过垃圾回收将 回收之前，释放非托管资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法; `Finalize` 在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的方法，除非已通过调用方法禁用了垃圾回收器终止 。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))、 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已将 其添加到中，则将具有 ，并将 分配 给它。A will have an if it has been added to an and the assigns an to it. 负责将分配 给 。The is responsible for assigning the to the . 更改组件的值 不一定会更改分配到的站点的名称 。Changing the value of the component's does not necessarily change the name of the site the is assigned to. 属性应仅由设置 。The property should be set only by an . `null`如果 从其移除，则属性值为 。The property value is `null` if the is removed from its . 分配 `null` 给此属性不一定会 从中删除 。Assigning `null` to this property does not necessarily remove the from the . 可能有也可能没有名称。A might or might not have a name. 如果 为指定了名称，则该名称 在其内的其他对象中必须是唯一的 。If a is given a name, the name must be unique among other objects within its . 存储的名称 ; 因此， 如果有与之关联的，则只能命名为 。The stores the name of the ; therefore, you can only name a if it has an associated with it.
